categories.common: Expected in more than 1% of users. Usually mild and temporary.
categories.uncommon: Occur in 0.1-1% of users. Should be monitored.
categories.rare: Occur in less than 0.1% of users. May require medical attention.
categories.severe: Require immediate medical attention. Stop medication and seek help.

general_adherence_tips: Take medications at the same time every day
Use a pill organizer or medication box
Store medications properly (cool, dry place unless specified)
Do not crush or split pills unless instructed
Keep an updated list of all medications with you
Inform all healthcare providers about your medications

missed_dose_guidance.general: Take as soon as you remember. If close to next dose, skip the missed dose.
missed_dose_guidance.antibiotics: Take immediately when remembered. Complete the full course.
missed_dose_guidance.blood_pressure: Take when remembered. Never double up doses.
missed_dose_guidance.diabetes: Check blood sugar first. Follow specific medication guidelines.
missed_dose_guidance.blood_thinners: Contact your doctor for guidance. Do not double dose.

when_to_contact_doctor: Severe allergic reactions (difficulty breathing, facial swelling, severe rash)

antacids: May affect absorption of many medications - take 2 hours apart
caffeine: May interact with asthma medications and some antibiotics

storage_guidelines.keep_dry: All medications should be kept away from humidity

emergency_symptoms.action: Call emergency services or go to nearest hospital immediately
